comment.author: 54902021@N02
comment._content:
if I were asked to ID this helicopter, I would say that it is Ka-226  CH  Ru CW 
without it's main componet, at least being showed in the picture. 
This AC comes with a detachable rear cargo section or Shell.
This section is approximate 2x to 2.5x the size of the Pilots area
and can be used (open) for various cargo, or with seats
